tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE water_quality_monitoring_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  date DATE,
  ph_level FLOAT,
  dissolved_oxygen FLOAT,
  turbidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE WaterQualityData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  parameter VARCHAR(255),
  value FLOAT,
  date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MonitoringStations (
  station_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  station_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  date_established DATE
)

CREATE TABLE water_quality_monitoring_data (
    monitoring_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    water_quality_index INT
)

CREATE TABLE water_sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    source_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE water_quality_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    monitoring_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    contamination_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE water_quality_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT NOT NULL,
    parameter_id INT NOT NULL,
    measurement_date DATE NOT NULL,
    measurement_time TIME NOT NULL,
    measurement_value FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE water_quality_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  date_established DATE
)

CREATE TABLE water_quality_parameters (
  parameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  parameter_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  parameter_unit VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  parameter_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE water_quality_measurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT,
  parameter_id INT,
  measurement_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
  measurement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE water_quality_trends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT,
  parameter_id INT,
  trend_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
  trend_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE water_quality_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_id INT,
  trend_analysis TEXT
)
